actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to authorize and direct the secretary of Agriculture to study lands within the Keweenaw Peninsula of Michigan to determine if the lands should be acquired and administered as National Forest lands.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to study lands within the Keweenaw Peninsula of Michigan to determine if the lands should be acquired and administered as national Forest lands. Authorizes an appropriation of $100,000 for fiscal year 1975 and $65,000 for fiscal year 1976 for such study.

titles.title: A bill to authorize and direct the secretary of Agriculture to study lands within the Keweenaw Peninsula of Michigan to determine if the lands should be acquired and administered as National Forest lands.
